name: There and back again, short trip outside Luzern with the dragon in the background.Hergisvil and Alpnach Stad.
description: During our trip we will travel by train or/and the ship. We will visit two places where dragon have been seen. Elder and younger ones will enjoy the fabulous landscapes of the monumental Pilatus mountain, with the steepest cablecar on the world. We will admire the human art as welll while visiting the "Glasi" glass fastory, where you can see "on life" how glas masters blow vases, glasses,plates and many more. Interactive museum and fantastic glass marbles playground makes the tour unforgettable.
